title: NFT for the masses
description: What is the strategy to onboard the first billion people? How do you make NFTs accessible to the non-technical or non-crypto people
solution: NFT is one of the most familiar entry points for non-crypto people or non-tech people to entry into blockchain rabbit hole
experience: Experienced international  team with 15+ years in co-creating value in the IT sector with expertise in cloud services delivery and ISO27001
